cells.data:
•  Green’s thesis (part 1)
    •  understand for a single vector bundle
    •  check that fibre integration gives us the first chern class
  •  Green’s thesis (part 2)
    •  the general (k,k) term
    •  TrAtiyah.hs
    •  type up Julien’s fibre integration proof
  •  Green’s thesis (part 3)
    •  get all your definitions straight in Simplicial connections and other conventions
    •  Green’s example (and more generality)
    •  point out that the powers of the atiyah class give the exponential chern classes
  •  the de Rham story
    •  do things work for simplicial coherent sheaves?
  •  BM96
    •  cochains as a functor
    •  make this work in the holomorphic case
      •  Algebraic transgression
  •  why differential cohomology isn’t exactly what we need
  •  twisted complexes
    •  summary: Twisted complexes and twisting cochains
    •  deformations of associative algebras?
    •  is it ok that we just forget about them after constructing the resolution?
